mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from HBF Health, with a monthly premium of $300, offers comprehensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care - all essential considerations given your health profile, which includes conditions like hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, and stroke. Furthermore, the high coverage limit of $500,000, along with a manageable maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6,500, makes this plan both suitable for your needs and affordable within your upper-middle income bracket. However, keep in mind that cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments are excluded from coverage.
